Less Important: Section Introduction

The final section of this site is titled “Less Important.” That name was chosen for a reason: these things aren’t unimportant, but they’re not as critically important as the other steps, and they’re a bit more abstract. Using the techniques listed here require you to understand how surveillance and metadata work and how to think creatively to imagine possible unseen or future threats. In this section:

  • Countries of Origin
  • Voice-over-IP
  • Encrypted Messaging
  • Healthy online Habits
  • Disinformation
  • Internet of Things (aka Smart Devices) Privacy & Security
  • VPNs
